mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cash( member_id, cash_date, cash_kind, category_name, cash_price, cash_place, cash_memo ) VALUES( #{memberId}, #{cashDate}, #{cashKind}, #{categoryName}, #{cashPrice}, #{cashPlace}, #{cashMemo} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cash SET cash_kind = #{cashKind}, category_name = #{categoryName}, cash_price = #{cashPrice}, cash_place = #{cashPlace}, cash_memo = #{cashMemo} WHERE cash_no = #{cashNo}
mapper.select: SELECT cash_no AS cashNo, category_name AS categoryName, cash_kind AS cashKind, cash_price AS cashPrice, cash_place AS cashPlace, cash_memo AS cashMemo FROM cash WHERE cash_no = #{cashNo}

SELECT cash_no AS cashNo, category_name AS categoryName, cash_kind AS cashKind, cash_price AS cashPrice, cash_place AS cashPlace, cash_memo AS cashMemo FROM cash WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND cash_date = #{cashDate} ORDER BY cash_no ASC

SELECT (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(cash_price) ,'0') FROM cash WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND cash_kind = '수입' AND cash_date = #{cashDate}) - (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(cash_price) ,'0') FROM cash WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND cash_kind = '지출' AND cash_date = #{cashDate}) FROM dual

SELECT (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(cash_price) ,'0') FROM cash WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND cash_kind = '수입' AND YEAR(cash_date) = #{year} AND MONTH(cash_date) = #{month}) - (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(cash_price) ,'0') FROM cash WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND cash_kind = '지출' AND YEAR(cash_date) = #{year} AND MONTH(cash_date) = #{month}) FROM dual

SELECT MONTH(cash_date) as day, SUM(CASE WHEN cash_kind='수입' THEN cash_price WHEN cash_kind='지출' THEN -cash_price END) AS price FROM cash WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND YEAR(cash_date) = #{year} GROUP BY MONTH(cash_date)

SELECT (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(cash_price) ,'0') FROM cash WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND cash_kind = '수입' AND YEAR(cash_date) = #{year}) - (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(cash_price) ,'0') FROM cash WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND cash_kind = '지출' AND YEAR(cash_date) = #{year}) FROM dual
